imdb.plot outline: Heritage Places is a show dedicated to the beauty and grandeur of architecture in North America - with a specific focus on architoursim to attract a wider range of people to visit and enjoy built and cultural heritage. Come join Christopher Cooper as he embarks on a quest of discovery for the most unusual and interesting historic buildings, structures and sites to be found in North America.
imdb.title: Heritage Places
plot: _Heritage Places_ (qv) is a show dedicated to the beauty and grandeur of architecture in North America - with a specific focus on architoursim to attract a wider range of people to visit and enjoy built and cultural heritage. Come join Christopher Cooper as he embarks on a quest of discovery for the most unusual and interesting historic buildings, structures and sites to be found in North America.::Christopher Cooper
